TextView.android:text:
Use arrow keys to move the target, then press SPACE or CENTER to select the power. Press SPACE or CENTER twice to kick.
\n Your score will be depended by the ball slided on the power bar then the score will be added by 1, 2 or 3 points.
\n If the goalkeeper save the goal then your ball left will be subtracted by 1. And if your ball is running out, your game is over.
